name: Bundle Deal!
description:
You've made a great decision by clicking on our bundle deal!

Sometimes you just want a little bit of everything, don't worry, it's natural to want it all. But now you can have it!

For the low price of $20 + shipping the following can be yours!

-Your choice of American Apparel t-shirt
-BOTH of our full length CDs
-A copy of our vinyl split with The Pauses

These are some serious savings, yo! Think about it, that's all we ask.

name: Great Deceivers/The Pauses 12" Split EP
description:
One vinyl. Two bands. Four songs. To preview our side of this record head over to greatdeceivers.bandcamp.com. You can hear The Pauses' track at thepauses.bandcamp.com. 

These vinyl will be expertly packaged and shipped for maximum safety.

name: Seasons In Reverse CD & Cassette / House of Stairs CD
description:
These CDs aren't available for purchase together, we just wanted to save a little space in our store.

'Seasons In Reverse' was released in August 2011. The CDs are part of a run of 500 hand-screenprinted and hand-numbered copies. Which means once we're out, we're out! Get them while they're hot, or at least room temperature. 

'Seasons' is also available on cassette. It looks really nice, the artwork and colors vary from copy to copy. 

'House of Stairs' was released in July 2010. We've only got a few of these guys left, don't wait, get yours now! 


'Seasons' CD - $8
'Seasons' Cassette - $4
'House' - $7

name: Reduced Price Tees!
description:
These 2 designs are both printed on American Apparel. There's nothing wrong with them either! We've just had them for a little while and we want to put them in your hands...or on your bodies...

The 'Minotaur' Tee on the left is available only in Extra Large. Makes a great back patch! It's two colors of ink, a darker and lighter purple on a tan-colored tee.

The 'She-Beast' Tee on the right is available only in Medium. It's black in printed on an Asphalt-colored tee.

name: 'Seasons' Tee Shirt
description:
Printed on American Apparel. Available in 2 colors:

-Red ink underlaid with pink on a Lemon-colored tee
-Blue ink underlaid with green on an Ash Grey Sea Foam-colored tee

This is a great buy! Comfortable and suitable for use as a blanket, towel, or just to stay one step ahead of the fashion police! 

Available in Small, Medium, Large and XL.
